resultPayload.note: Hours/lead-time baseline configured on biz metadata.

data.instruction: Create baseline availability and lead-time rules representing the UC default business hours and booking window behavior.
data.expectedResult: Availability defaults and rules are stored and can be referenced by calendars.

resultPayload.note: Hours/lead-time baseline configured on biz metadata.

data.instruction: Upload snapshots for critical steps and submit final markdown report summarizing pass/fail and discovered gaps.
data.expectedResult: Run has persisted report + snapshots in project directory and indexed metadata in DB.

resultPayload.note: Cross-biz read blocked for non-member account.

data.instruction: Using credentials from another context, attempt to read or mutate booking/order resources for this biz.
data.expectedResult: Request is rejected with forbidden/unauthorized error and no data leakage.

resultPayload.note: Cross-biz read blocked for non-member account.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Query path that resolves access level during availability reads". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Create at least one host resource and one non-host resource (asset or venue) suitable for the UC.
data.expectedResult: Resources are created with expected type, location, and buffers.
